channel.title: Wtf?>?
channel.description:
when i compile my server says this
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
how can i fix this someone has to know...

item.title: Wtf?>?
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Use this compiler:

@echo off :build if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You Havent Downloaded Java .... :end echo Finished! pause goto :build

No problem

Read full topic
